attractions. Embassies would entertain; networks and local
commercial stations would host; the Broadcasters Club and
the Army-Navy Club would be at our disposal. A special trip
to Hagerstown would be feasible.
Please fill out the ballot below and mail promptly. If the
Board favors, I will proceed to poll the membership.
Bill Harley
NAEB
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
